Description:
Our client provides engineering, project management, asset management, and integrity services to the worldwide energy industry. They are currently hiring a Financial Accountant to run the accounting for their Al Khobar, Branch, KSA. Reporting to the Finance Manager, the Financial Accountant will be responsible for the day-to-day financial operations of the company and compliance with all local government and tax filings, etc.Perform general ledger accounting and bookkeeping duties.
Local compliance and filing of all local government and tax returns.
Preparation of local management accounts, project KPIs, and reports.
Management and reconciliations of debtors.
Local creditor administration and payments.
Management of local employee payroll and expenses.
Gathering information in response to auditor requests.  
Assist the Finance Manager and Group Finance on ad hoc projects, as required.Skills
Skills:
The successful candidate will be a detail-oriented self-starter with strong local tax compliance experience and a sound understanding of accounting principles.
Bachelor's degree in Accounting or a related field.
Minimum 7 to 10 years prior experience in accounting or finance roles, preferably in a similar industry or sector.
Strong knowledge of Saudi Arabian accounting principles tax regulations and filing requirements.
Strong attention to detail to ensure accuracy in financial records and Arabic reporting.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English and to effectively interact with remote teams and effectively communicate issues.
Proficient in using accounting software and Microsoft Office applications, particularly Excel. 
Demonstrates honesty, ethics, and professionalism in handling financial matters.
Excellent Arabic and English communication skills are essential.

Preferred.Residence Location: Dammam, Saudi Arabia ; Dhahran Al Janoub, Saudi Arabia ; Khobar, Saudi Arabia
